instruction: Atovaquone/proguanil, directions: begin the morning before embarkation, then one tablet daily with food and milk, continue seven days after docking home, targeted condition: malaria prevention.

attributes.sig: Begin the morning before embarkation, then one tablet daily with food and milk, continue seven days after docking home.

instruction: Store pens in the cabin fridge, needle side up. For missed meals, still swallow the malaria pill with even a cracker.

attributes.comment: Store pens in the cabin fridge, needle side up.

coding.display: Recommended to maintain supply of blood ketone test strips
